announcements.title: Launcher v2.0.2 Released
body: This is a minor update with a few new features and improvements:
- Added a check for updates button in the details page
- The launcher automatically checks for game updates when it opens
- The launcher also checks for launcher updates when it opens

announcements.title: Everdew v0.3.4 Released
body: Everdew has been updated to version 0.3.4!
This update includes small additions and fixes:
- Added a fullscreen toggle in the pause menu
- Added a resolution dropdown in the pause menu
- Made the transition from main menu to game smoother
